CustomField.description: A saved copy of the score, if the "Update Account with Score Update" option is enabled. This field is only intended for custom triggers or third-party systems that can't track formula fields.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: A saved copy of the score, if the "Update Account with Score Update" option is enabled. This field is only intended for custom triggers or third-party systems that can't track formula fields.
CustomField.label: Infer Score Snapshot NOT FOR LAYOUT
